abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played in an online practice game by Andrew Robson, who recently became an officer of the Most Excellent Order of the British Empire for his services to bridge and charity.
lead_paragraph: Each Jan. 1 the reigning British monarch announces an honors list. British and Commonwealth subjects are recognized for especially meritorious achievement in almost any field.

headline.main: Andrew Robson Given Order of the British Empire
headline.seo: Bridge — Andrew Robson Given Order of the British Empire

snippet: Each Jan. 1 the reigning British monarch announces an honors list. British and Commonwealth subjects are recognized for especially meritorious achievement in almost any field....
